titles: The nonconformists advocate, or, A farther account of their judgment in certain things in which they are misunderstood written principally in vindication of A letter from a minister to a person of quality, shewing some reasons for his nonconformity, modesty answering the exceptions of two violent opposers of the said reasons.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Written by Richard Baxter. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Letter from a minister to a person of quality, shewing some reasons for his non-conformity.
